hadiths.text: Kharijab bin Hudhafah narrated:"Allah's Messenger came out to us and he said: 'Indeed Allah has assisted you with a Salat that is better for you than red camels: Al-Witr which Allah made for you between the Isha prayer till Al-Fajr has begun

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي فَضْلِ الْوِتْرِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Virtue Of Al-Witr
